data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter D. M. Moore (ed.) (1980): CCIII Orchidaceae. In: Flora Europaea, Vol 5: Alismataceae to Orchidaceae. Camebridge: Cambridge University Press: 325-350, ISBN: 052120108X, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.215522
